channel.title: Small question
channel.description: Alright, i have cannons on my server working with only 3 glitches, they dont show action, dont acually deal damage like it shows, and anybody can pick it up. That last one i mentioned is the one i want help fixing mainly, for the specific perpous of steeling someone cannon on my server. How can i make it so that when someone sets up an object, it assigns the object to them?

item.title: Small question
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“Owner Barter, post:2, topic:300386”][quote author=CoonHunter link=topic=396668.msg2945929#msg2945929 date=1252212387]
Alright, i have cannons on my server working with only 3 glitches, they dont show action, dont acually deal damage like it shows, and anybody can pick it up. That last one i mentioned is the one i want help fixing mainly, for the specific perpous of steeling someone cannon on my server. How can i make it so that when someone sets up an object, it assigns the object to them?
[/quote]
That’s very tricky, I have no idea.[/quote]
Lmao, well tbh im just lucky to have set up a cannon with that little glitches.

Read full topic
